column5: Other outfitters in the Nakina area are Twin Lakes outfitters, Bauers Onaman Lake, Leuenbergers, 7 Lakes, Ogoki Lake Outfitters, Meta Lake Lodge, Ara Lake Camps, Makoke Lodge, Esnagami Lodge. They may be a little more than $750.
Cozy camp has a great boatin outpost, nice numbers plus size,
Mike Anderson has a boatin outpost that is great fishing, Lots of nice size fish, for around $600
Reddmon You have a Private Message
Looking for info on a outpost in NW Ontario/Manitoba. Interested in remote lakes with trophy's, catch n release and take home fish. Haven't done an outpost in 30yrs. Budget is roughly around $750pp.
Not sure about MB, but for NW Ontario you will likely have to increase your budget at least $200pp.

I agree with adempsey. You will be hard pressed to find an outpost on a trophy lake for $750 unless you go with one of the outfitters in the Wawa area. Average nowadays for a seven day trip in Northwest Ontario has to be around $1200-1500 US. We are doing a 6 day trip with Slate Falls Outposts for $1115 but that's a special price they offer in July and August on Miniss Lake. Regular price is around $1500. Check them out here www.slatefallsoutposts.com. Also check out adempsey's site at www.lineonfishing.com He has a ton of info about fly-ins and outfitters in Ontario. Also check out Amik Outposts out of Red Lake. They have several outposts northwest of Red Lake on trophy lakes for around $1300. www.canadianflyinfishing.com Good luck with your search.
Check out www.hiddenbay.com , they have a meal plan, great people and fantastic fishing! They put you up the night before the flight, nice plane too,! Tell Shaggy I sent you,!
Lots of great options in the Nakina, ON area.

Ditto on Nakina outfitters. Hearst air offers several outposts at around $950. Cabins might be a little more rustic but they're on some good fishing lakes. You can see some great trip reports on several outposts here www.canadafishingguide.net just click on trip reports. I see you have your own boat. You might consider a boat in camp or outpost especially if cost is an issue.
You might look at Stokes Bay Resort on Rainy lake...It is a boat in very remote.Great fishing and prices.....It is a rustic outpost camp.
white river air dayohessarah lake tell dan chad sent you
Check this outfitter out. Flies out of Nakina.
